about_the_game:
Your trip to a gloomy abandoned mansion led to an imprisonment inside the maniac’s house. It was an itch for gain that led you here, but this place still reeks of fear of its previous victims, and only the desperate will to survive will help you to win back your freedom. You’ll have to work hard to stay alive, let alone escape or find out who’s hiding behind the mask of the Puppeteer.

There are no accidents. So what were the transgressions that brought YOU here?

The very first minutes of play will treat you to an engaging detective plot, realistic graphics and sublime music. Better yet, varying gameplay, countless quests, puzzles and brainteasers will hold you captive in Panic Room 2: Hide and Seek for hours on end.

In the game you are expected:
★ Mystical detective story - continuation of the story of the abandoned mansion of the Puppeteer
★ Many game locations for searching for items and passing modes
★ Realistic graphics and music perfectly suited to the atmosphere
★ Collections, puzzles and quests – the whole set of hidden object games
★ Varying gameplay! A cornucopia of puzzles, collections and diverse activities will keep you entertained and keep the game dynamic and captivating.
★ Different game modes! Master the original gameplay modes such as «Night», «Shadows» or «Invisible ink» that add variety and excitement.
★ Extensive social aspect! Make friends, talk to them, help each other and exchange gifts!
★ It will be interesting for both adults and children
★ The game and all its updates are absolutely free
★ Regularly a new game event starts in the game in which you need to search and collect unique items

You will like this game if:
  • you're a true fan of "hidden objects" genre
  • you prefer thrillers or detective stories to any other books
  • you're attracted by mysteries and spine-chilling atmosphere
  • you like looking for items and putting collections and puzzles together.

Panic Room 2: Hide and Seek is a free cross–platform game for computers and phones, which is constantly updated!
